mapper.select: SELECT local_auth_id, user_name, password, create_time, last_edit_time, user_id FROM tb_local_auth WHERE user_name=#{userName} AND password=#{password}
SELECT local_auth_id, user_name, password, create_time, last_edit_time, user_id FROM tb_local_auth WHERE user_id=#{userId}
SELECT local_auth_id, user_name, password, create_time, last_edit_time, user_id FROM tb_local_auth ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize};
